body_html: The tests depend on the input being a single Variable in more places than I originally thought. I need more time to fix that, or you can just temporarily add a regular test method to the TestNN class. You can use autograd.gradcheck.
body_text: The tests depend on the input being a single Variable in more places than I originally thought. I need more time to fix that, or you can just temporarily add a regular test method to the TestNN class. You can use autograd.gradcheck.
body: The tests depend on the input being a single Variable in more places than I originally thought. I need more time to fix that, or you can just temporarily add a regular test method to the `TestNN` class. You can use `autograd.gradcheck`.
